result.execSummary:
Shad Travis Kenneth Kindt was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Shad Travis Kenneth Kindt was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shad Travis Kenneth Kindt

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Extradition Hearing:  1:10 pm Defendant Shad T.K. Kindt in court with attorney Daniel E. Firkus.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared for the Village of Luck.  JP-clerk  Per PD - DE waives Extradition.  Ct goes over Extradition papers.  Payment plan first payment due 9-1-15.  $50 to get out of jail is quashed.  1:17 pm adj.
Report in support of probable cause for arrest. Request for criminal complaint.

Defendant Shad T.K. Kindt in court with attorney Daniel E. Firkus via telephone.  Defendant Shad T.K. Kindt in custody.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared for the Village of Luck.  BJM-clerk 1:02 pm CT - MN warrant out for Def.  State - prepared a Waiver of Extradition for Washington Cty.  11FO572 - Def req new pp.  CT - $50.00 to get out of jail.  PP beg 9/1/15 - $25.00 per mo & on the 1st of e/m thereafter.  CT - Warrant is quashed.  Extradition:  State - as of 5/11/15 - Washington Cty has detainer hold.  Atty Firkus - has no knowledge.  This matter will be adjourned to allow Atty Firkus to go over extrad paperwork.  1:07 pm adj.  Hearing scheduled for August 7, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
